name: Plexus Lock Screen
description_2: With Plexus Lock Screen you can lock the Plexus app and stop from allowing unknown users browsing on your account on the app. The lock screen currently offers only two ways of unlocking, you can decide if you want to use a passcode or fingerprint. We are planning to implement in later stages Facial and Eyeris capabilities to unlock Plexus.

name: Plexus Update V1.1.3 - March Update
description_1:
This update includes a bunch of new features and performance improvements. 
We are working hard everyday to ensure the best performance for our users. We made a few small noticable performance imporvements to Plexus.
